This folder must contain at least 3 files (do not delete them!):

drones.txt - contain all drone nick list with this format:

=== Begin of file ===
3
=papo=
=grin=
=lima=
=== End of file ===

igops.txt - contain in game OP's, don't edit this file. Server will handle it.

ingame.txt - contain in game Players, don't edit this file. Server will handle it.

---------------------

Other files are:

player.score - contains server generated information when client type .score
player.medal - contains server generated information when client type .medals

You may delete these (.score and .medal) files. Server will re create them
